articles.description: Tottenham Hotspur miss the chance to move into the Champions League qualification places after being held by West Ham at a rainy London Stadium in the Premier League.
articles.title: Spurs held at West Ham and miss chance to go fourth

articles.description: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola defends striker Erling Haaland following Roy Keane's criticism after Sunday's 0-0 draw with Arsenal.
articles.title: Guardiola backs Haaland after Keane ‘League Two’ jibe

articles.description: Lost earnings? Lost fitness? Lost opportunities? Lost time? The issues that Women's Super League players weigh up when adding to their families.
articles.title: 'I couldn't really speak about it' - a decision dividing the WSL

articles.description: Dominic Calvert-Lewin converts a late penalty as Everton gain a vital point in their battle to avoid relegation with a draw at Newcastle.
articles.title: Late Calvert-Lewin penalty earns point for Everton

articles.description: Scottish Rugby still has confidence Gregor Townsend can improve Scotland's Six Nations performances despite 2024 being "not good enough".
articles.title: Scottish Rugby 'still has confidence' in Townsend

articles.description: Adam Peaty lays down a marker as he qualifies for the Paris Olympics by winning the 100m breaststroke title at the Aquatics GB Swimming Championships.
articles.title: Adam Peaty qualifies for Paris Olympics with statement win at Aquatics GB Swimming Championships

articles.description: New York Times journalist Rory Smith explains why Sporting Lisbon manager Ruben Amorim is the "front-runner" to replace Jurgen Klopp as Liverpool boss.
articles.title: Why is Amorim 'front-runner' for Liverpool job?

articles.description: American Ryder Cup player Anthony Kim says he fell victim to "scam artists" and "snakes" during his absence from pro golf.
articles.title: Anthony Kim: American Ryder Cup player opens up on 12-year absence from golf

articles.description: Nottingham Forest give their hopes of Premier League survival a crucial boost with a convincing victory over Fulham at the City Ground.
articles.title: Forest beat Fulham to boost survival hopes

articles.description: New Zealand's most-capped player Sam Whitelock will retire from rugby at the end of the French club season.
articles.title: New Zealand legend Whitelock to retire
